publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1014 Roseanna Cunningham: Regulation of Investigatory Powers (Scotland) Bill: Order of Consideration—That the Justice and Home Affairs Committee consider the Regulation of Investigatory Powers (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 in the following order: sections 1 to 28, long title.
